definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand/(Tw) mechanic/blue-collar worker/manual laborer
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand

sentences.english: Russian mafias headquarter was based in Chicago, America.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯黑手黨的總部是總部設在美國的芝加哥。

sentences.english: His election campaign was bankrolled by the Mafia .
sentences.chinese: 他的競選活動有黑手黨的財務資助。

sentences.english: The organization is a sort of Ku Klux Klan in the industrial sphere.
sentences.chinese: 這個組織在工業界類似於黑手黨。

sentences.english: Black Hands also work well against Seekers and Devourers .
sentences.chinese: 黑手在對抗搜索者和吞食者時也非常有效。

sentences.english: I know how you controlled Blackhand, you and your Shadow Council.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你們如何控制了黑手，你和你的暗影議會。

sentences.english: Speculation swirled throughout the day Wednesday that the 84-year-old leader had passed away.
sentences.chinese: 投機黑手，星期三在一天的84歲領導人去世了。

sentences.english: MTK platform, and part of the Black mobile phone platform used by domestic manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: MTK平臺，目前黑手機和部分國內廠家使用的平臺。

sentences.english: He can be ruthless in getting what he wants, but I believe he would stop short of blackmail.
sentences.chinese: 黑手辣的，但我認爲他還不至於使用敲詐手段。

sentences.english: And guess at the real black hand CengHongShu is behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 並猜測出幕後的真正黑手就是曾宏樞。

sentences.english: This was a threat, of course, familiar to those who have been visited by the mafia.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，這是一個威脅，很有黑手黨的範兒。

sentences.english: It's these clouts below the belt I can't take.
sentences.chinese: 只是那些幕後的黑手讓我無法忍受。

sentences.english: Mobster thugs sitting in cafes, sipping tea in little glasses.
sentences.chinese: 那幫坐在咖啡店裏的黑手黨，小口喝着小杯子裏的茶。

sentences.english: The “Godfather” is a story about the powerful mafia families in New York.
sentences.chinese: 電影《教父》就是有關紐約黑手黨的豪門大戶的故事。

sentences.english: Added garrison-clearing effects for Nod Flame Tank, Nod Black Hand, and Scrin Corrupter units.
sentences.chinese: 增加了火焰坦克，黑手和腐敗者清建築時的畫面效果。

sentences.english: But don't want to be Xu Yanqiu under the black hand in the dark, cruel to kill.
sentences.chinese: 不想卻被徐豔秋在暗處下了黑手，殘忍將其殺害。

definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand
to manipulate from behind the scenes/to pull the strings
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
to incite/to prompt (sb to do sth)
